title: Fix portfolio gallery images and reorganize into categorized sections

requirements.summary: Replace portfolio gallery with four separate tab categories (Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) displaying categorized project images with dialog-based lightbox interface
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio gallery displays four tabs labeled Home, Commercial, Office, and Hotels
Clicking a tab switches the displayed image grid to that category
Each category displays its own distinct set of interior design images
Images open in a dialog lightbox when clicked
Navigation between tabs maintains the same UI pattern as existing gallery

file_operations.description: Replace the existing three-tab structure (living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens) with four new tabs: Home, Commercial, Office, and Hotels. Update the tab state management and ensure each tab displays its own category of images. Maintain the existing dialog-based lightbox pattern for viewing images with titles and descriptions. Keep the established luxury design aesthetic with warm earth tones and gold accents from the existing component.

requirements.summary: Render 120 generated portfolio images (30 per category) from frontend/public/assets/generated directory with titles and detailed descriptions in lightbox
acceptanceCriteria: Home category displays 30 residential interior design images
Commercial category displays 30 commercial space interior images
Office category displays 30 office interior design images
Hotels category displays 30 hotel interior design images
Each image displays a title in the lightbox dialog
Each image displays a detailed description in the lightbox dialog
All images load from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
